short_definition: A discovery request from one party to the other party for such other party to deliver the documents to a particular location for inspection or copying.
long_definition_html: A discovery request from one party to the other party for such other party to deliver the documents to a particular location for inspection or copying.
long_definition_markdown: A discovery request from one party to the other party for such other party to deliver the documents to a particular location for inspection or copying.
long_definition_text: A discovery request from one party to the other party for such other party to deliver the documents to a particular location for inspection or copying.
